title: Anthropic’s Claude Is Competing With ChatGPT. Even Its Builders Fear AI.
description: Anthropic, a safety-focused A.I. start-up, is trying to compete with ChatGPT while preventing an A.I. apocalypse. It’s been a little stressful.

title: Court Ruling Clears Path for Microsoft to Buy Activision
description: Microsoft also said it was negotiating changes to the deal to satisfy objections made by a British regulator, which could allow it to complete its purchase of the video game giant as soon as this month.

title: Why the Early Success of Threads May Crash Into Reality
description: Mark Zuckerberg has used Meta’s might to push Threads to a fast start — but that may only work up to a point.

title: What to Know About ChatGPT’s New Code Interpreter Feature
description: Graphs, maps and data analyses? Now ChatGPT can do even more.
